info.URL_PARAMS_PARSED_SUCCESS: The given parameters from called URL have been parsed successfully
info.URL_PARAMS_FORMFILL_SUCCESS: Successfully filled form with the given parameters from called URL
info.START_VERIFICATION_CALL: Sending data to backend for verification
info.START_CHECKING_RESPONSE: Verification response received - start checking response
info.UPP_HAS_BEEN_FOUND: UPP for that data has been found on Ubirch server
info.RESPONSE_JSON_PARSED_SUCCESSFULY: Verification response has been parsed successfully
info.NO_BLXTX_FOUND: The data has not been anchored in any blockchain yet
info.VERIFICATION_SUCCESSFUL_INFO:
For more information about anchoring click the ubirch icon to open verification details in ubirch console 
or click the blockchain icons to open corresponding blockchain explorer
info.BLOCKCHAIN_SETTINGS_INCOMPLETE: Settings are missing blockchain bettings; not all bLockchain anchor can be solved.

error.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR: Internal Server Error. Something went wrong.
error.VERIFICATION_FAILED_MISSING_SEAL_IN_RESP: Verification Failed!! Empty certificate or missing seal
error.URL_PARAMS_CORRUPT: Called URL (from QRCode) contains at least one not allowed character that could corrupt this verification
error.LOCATION_MALFORMED: Called URL (from QRCode) is not in a correct URL format
error.MANDATORY_FIELD_MISSING: Mandatory form fields not set - if you scanned a QRCode it seems to be incorrect
error.URL_PARAMS_FORMFILL_FAILED: Unable to fill the form with the given parameters from called URL
error.FILLING_FORM_WITH_PARAMS_FAILED: Unable to fill the form with the given parameters from called URL
error.JSON_MALFORMED: Building internal JSON format from input string failed
error.MISSING_PROPERTY_IN_UBRICH_VERIFICATION_: Please, provide the `elementSelector` to UbirchVerification or UbirchFormVerification instance
error.ELEMENT_FOR_WIDGET_SELECTOR_NOT_FOUND: Element for widget selector not found
error.MISSING_PARAM_IDS: Please, provide a string array with param ids
error.PARAM_ID_MAPPING_MISSMATCH: If you provide paramsFormIdsMapping define a mapping for each formId; they need to be in the same order
error.MISSING_ACCESS_TOKEN: You need to provide an accessToken to verify data
error.CERTIFICATE_DATA_MISSING: Missing data - please fill out form completely or scan your QR code!
error.VERIFICATION_NOT_POSSIBLE: Errors in given data found - verification not possible
error.VERIFICATION_FAILED_EMPTY_RESPONSE: Verification Failed! Empty certificate or missing seal
error.VERIFICATION_FAILED_CANNOT_DECODE_HWDEVI: The Thing through which the data has been anchored cannot be identified (Decoding hwDeviceId from UPP failed)
error.VERIFICATION_FAILED_DEVICE_PUBKEY_CANNOT: Something is wrong with the encryption of the data (Verification of thing with UPP failed)
error.VERIFICATION_FAILED_WRONG_TYPE_PREFIX: Verification Failed!! Wrong Prefix for type
error.NOT_YET_IMPLEMENTED: This function is not yet implemented
